org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.internalData.Security
Class SecurityByteArrayTools

java.lang.Object
  org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.internalData.Security.SecurityByteArrayTools

public class SecurityByteArrayTools
extends java.lang.Object

The SecurityByteArrayTools class provides methods to convert byte arrays to hex strings and vice versa.

HexStringToByteArray

public byte[] HexStringToByteArray(java.lang.String hexString)
Converts a hex string to its corresponding byte array

Parameters:
hexString - the hex string to be converted to a byte array. The special chars 'A-F' are handled case-insensitive.
Returns:
byte array representation of the hex string

ByteArrayToHexString

public java.lang.String ByteArrayToHexString(byte[] byteArray)
Converts a byte array to its corresponding hex string

Parameters:
byteArray - the byte array to be converted to a hex string
Returns:
hex string representation of the byte array. The special chars 'A-F' output is upper case.
